explanation: [0-0] On a beige table covered with a rectangular piece of pink floral fabric, there are two pairs of scissors and a marker pen. Some other fabrics are on the upper left, and a pair of hands is pressing on the pink fabric in the upper right.

[0-7] First, the right hand folds one side of the pink fabric to the middle, then folds the other side to the middle as well, making the fabric into a triangle. Then fold it in half from the middle of the triangle. After that, both hands rotate the pink fabric, placing the corner of the triangle on the right side, placing the tape measure on one side of the triangular fabric, and using the right hand to mark the pink fabric with a piece of chalk. Then the tape measure is moved to make marks in the middle and on the left side of the triangle, and then the tape measure is removed from the right side.
